snippet: As a rookie, Kyrie Irving hasn’t made quite the same splash as Blake Griffin in the 2010-11 season, but the statistics reveal a player whose substance more than makes up for his lack of style.
abstract: Keeping Score column holds that statistics show Cleveland Cavaliers guard Kyrie Irving to be the best among NBA rookies in several years.
lead_paragraph: As a rookie, Kyrie Irving hasn’t made quite the same splash as Blake Griffin in the 2010-11 season, but the statistics reveal a player whose substance more than makes up for his lack of style.

headline.main: Fewer Slams, but Rookie Makes Mark With Efficiency
headline.print_headline: Fewer Slams, but Rookie Makes Mark With Efficiency
